Title: Enacts the "transparency in health care fees act"
Summary: Establishes the transparency in health care fees act requiring health care providers to submit bills to patients prior to performing services.
LawCode: Add Art 29-D Title 4-A ยง2999-l, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the "transparency in health care fees act"
